title: A defiance to death Wherein, besides sundry heauenly instructions for a godly life, we haue strong and notable comforts to vphold vs in death. By Mr. William Covvper, minister of Gods Word.
author: Cowper, William, 1568-1619.
publisher: Printed by I. W[indet] for Iohn Budge, and are to be sold at his shoppe at Britaines Burse,
notes: Identified as STC 5917a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
